title: Glottography dataset derived from Vuillermet 2012 "A Grammar of Ese Ejja, a Takanan language of the Bolivian Amazon"
description:
Cite the source of the dataset as:

Vuillermet, Marine. 2012. A Grammar of Ese Ejja, a Takanan language of the Bolivian Amazon. Université Lumière Lyon 2 dissertation. (xvi+736pp.)
